statements: DELETE FROM PlayerInteractionLog WHERE player_id = 101 AND interaction_type = 'Login';
DELETE FROM PlayerInteractionLog WHERE player_id = 50 AND interaction_type = 'comment'
DELETE FROM communication_logs WHERE log_type = 'warning' AND log_timestamp < '2023-01-01';

DELETE FROM conduct_monitoring WHERE conduct_type = 'Cheating' AND conduct_date >= '2022-01-01'
